messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: A CentComm official has been sent to inspect the station, everyone please respect the official

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The CentComm official was not satisfied with his report, you will all be docked pay

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: A CentComm Ash drake has been sent to test your security

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Devin Compton. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Devin Compton. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chapel.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: attention crew, the ash drake is a centcomm employee, you will adress him as sir

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Crew get the centcomm official off this station, we are abandoning it

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Quartermaster's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Devin Compton. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Our new president has declared that lizardmen are no longer people and will be henceforth be called liggers, don't ask me why, he is the president
